love this game just got a pc and catching up

Half-Life 2 is a major improvement over the last installment. The sound design is way less echoey and rough, the level design feels more natural, the combat is less repetitive & more than just standing in front of an enemy and shooting them, and the storyline is like nothing else I've played before. I also recommend playing the previous installments, though this game was created with people who haven't played HL1 in mind. It's one of my favorite singleplayers ever and I highly recommend.
it is very immersive and easy to use all the functions. seems very real.
I thought the game is really fun, I love the Half Life games!!

I'm playing this game in 2021. Nice atmosphere, all right shooter mechanics. I'm playing this in preparation for Half-Life: Alyx and so far it's been a good introduction to the Half Life world. The game's a little story-light and some of the action sequences go on for too long (the vehicle segments!) but I can see why this game is considered a classic.
